abstract: New York Mets expect to play Wilmer Flores at shortstop on opening day, unsettled position for the team in last two seasons; Flores is seen as part of promising wave of new prospects that could take team to playoffs in 2015; chart highlights eight Mets players that have taken the field at shortstop in at least 300 games over the team's 53 seasons.
lead_paragraph: The Mets have been unsettled at shortstop for two years. With a live bat but a defense that remains a work in progress, Wilmer Flores still has the confidence of the team’s front office.

headline.main: Playing Shortstop for the Mets, Wilmer Flores. Really? Yeah, Really.
headline.print_headline: Playing Shortstop for the Mets, Wilmer Flores. Really? Yes, Really.

snippet: The Mets have been unsettled at shortstop for two years. With a live bat but a defense that remains a work in progress, Wilmer Flores still has the confidence of the team’s front office.
